Performer:
Takezawa Yasaburō (see also Nozawa Kichinosuke) (竹澤弥三郎)

Alternate Name: Nozawa Kichinosuke (野澤吉之助)

Dates: '1974-1980/04;1983/02-'

Specialty: Shamisen

Notes: Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)


– Click image to view.
